name: Books - A Wizards Adventure
description:
Im really happy do show you my first game, completely made  in 48 hours for the Alakajam! It is called Books - A Wizards Adventure and plays in an old library at night. The main character, a wizard, has to defeat as much ghosts as he can to survive. You can also collect books, which are laying on the ground to unlock new spells .Because of the many dark areas and the "music" , it feels a bit like a horror game and the graphic style is inspired by "Dont Starve". 

Have fun^^

CONTROLS:
- use WASD to move
- Your spells are shot towards the cursor
- Use right-Mouse for Shooting 
- Use Escape to open the pause-menu (only ingame)
      - There you can adjust the resolution too
